entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
